TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS_TEXT:
Padel Rush – App & Facility Use Terms (Ireland)

1. Acceptance
Using the Padel Rush mobile application or any Padel Rush facilities in Ireland constitutes your agreement to these Terms & Conditions and to compliance with all applicable laws and regulations of Ireland.

2. Account
You must provide accurate and current contact information when creating an account. Accounts are personal, non-transferable, and must not be shared with others.

3. Bookings & Payments
All bookings made through the app are final.
• Fees are in EUR and are non-refundable.
• Cancellations made less than 24 hours before the booking time will incur the full charge.
• Late arrivals or no-shows are not refunded.

4. No Pets
Strictly no pets are allowed within Padel Rush facilities.

5. No Children in Active Zones
Children under 5 years of age are prohibited in padel courts, gyms, saunas, pools, and treatment rooms. They may only be present in supervised café or lounge areas.

6. No Food or Drinks
Food and beverages are strictly prohibited on courts, gym floors, and wellness areas.
• Water in shatterproof bottles is permitted.

7. No Smoking / Vaping
Smoking and vaping are strictly prohibited in all indoor areas and courts, in line with Irish legislation on indoor smoking bans. Please use designated outdoor smoking areas only.

8. Dress Code
Modest, appropriate activewear is required at all times.
• Non-marking sports shoes are mandatory on all courts.

9. Liability
Use of Padel Rush facilities is at your own risk. Padel Rush is not liable for any injury, loss, or theft except as provided under applicable Irish law.

10. Safety
All members and guests must comply with Irish Health & Safety Authority (HSA) guidelines and Padel Rush safety rules. Misconduct may result in expulsion without refund.

11. Data Collection
We collect your name, contact number, email address, and payment details for the purpose of:
• Booking and processing transactions
• Service improvements
• Customer support and communication

12. Data Use
All data is processed in accordance with EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and Irish data protection legislation. Your data will never be sold to third parties.

13. Data Security
We use industry-standard encryption to protect your data. Any suspected breaches should be reported immediately to: info@houseofpadel.co

14. Cookies
The app uses cookies for functionality. You can disable cookies through your device settings, but some features may not work correctly if you do.

15. Privacy
All personal data is handled in accordance with GDPR and our Privacy Policy (accessible in the app or on our website).

16. Termination
Accounts may be suspended or terminated for:
• Violations of these Terms
• Non-payment
• Misuse of the app or facilities

17. Amendments
Terms & Conditions are updated periodically. Continued use of the app and facilities constitutes acceptance of any changes.

18. Governing Law & Dispute Resolution
These Terms & Conditions are governed by the laws of Ireland. Any disputes shall be resolved through the courts of Ireland.

⸻

Liability Waiver & Release Agreement

1. Agreement to Terms
By registering for, accessing, or using Padel Rush's app and/or facilities, you acknowledge and agree to the terms outlined in this Liability Waiver & Release Agreement. Your acceptance of these terms constitutes a legally binding agreement between you and Padel Rush.

2. Assumption of Risk
You acknowledge that participation in padel, wellness activities, fitness training, sauna use, and any other services offered by Padel Rush involves inherent risks, including but not limited to:
• Physical injuries: sprains, fractures, muscle strains, concussions, or other sports-related injuries.

3. Release of Liability
To the fullest extent permitted by Irish law, you release, waive, and discharge Padel Rush, its owners, employees, coaches, instructors, contractors, and affiliates from any and all liability for personal injury, disability, death, property damage, theft, or any other loss arising from or in connection with your use of Padel Rush's facilities and services, including participation in classes, training, or app-related activities.

4. Indemnification
You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Padel Rush from any claims, damages, legal fees, or other costs arising from your actions, negligence, or failure to comply with these Terms & Conditions.

5. Health & Safety Declaration
You confirm that you are in good health and physically able to participate in sports and wellness activities at Padel Rush. You are responsible for consulting a medical professional before engaging in any physical activity.

6. Responsible Conduct
You agree to:
• Act respectfully toward other members, staff, and the facility.
• Use equipment and facilities responsibly.
• Refrain from disruptive, harmful, or unlawful behaviour.
• Abide by Padel Rush's hygiene, dress code, and code of conduct policies.

7. Media Release
You grant Padel Rush permission to capture photos and videos of you during activities for promotional and marketing purposes. You may opt out by notifying Padel Rush in writing.

8. App Usage Terms
The Padel Rush app is provided for booking, scheduling, and accessing services. You must not misuse or manipulate the app for unauthorised purposes. Padel Rush is not liable for technical issues, data breaches, or third-party integrations.

9. Governing Law & Dispute Resolution
This waiver is governed by Irish law. Any disputes will be resolved in the courts of Ireland.

10. Acceptance of Terms
By signing below or accepting electronically via the Padel Rush app, you confirm that you have read, understood, and voluntarily agreed to this Liability Waiver & Release Agreement.
RELEASE_OF_LIABILITY_FORM_DESC: I, the undersigned, hereby acknowledge and agree to the following terms and conditions in consideration of being allowed to participate in activities, events, and programs organized by Pickle Park SDN BHD:
ASSUMPTION_OF_RISK_DESCRIPTION: Assumption of Risk: I acknowledge that participation in pickleball and related activities involves inherent risks, including but not limited to the risk of injury, property damage, and other potential hazards. I voluntarily assume all risks associated with my participation.
PHYSICAL_CONDITION_DESCRIPTION: Physical Condition: I certify that I am in good health and have no physical condition that would prevent me from safely participating in pickleball activities. I agree to inform Pickle Park SDN BHD of any changes to my health status that may impact my ability to participate safely.
RELEASE_OF_LIABILITY_DESCRIPTION: Release of Liability: I release, waive, discharge, and covenant not to sue Pickle Park, its owners, employees, instructors, and affiliates from any and all liability, claims, demands, actions, and causes of action whatsoever arising out of or related to any loss, damage, or injury, including death, that may be sustained by me or any property belonging to me while participating pickleball activities
PHOTOGRAPHIC_RELEASE_DESCRIPTION: Photographic Release: I grant Pickle Park SDN BHD the right to use photographs and/or videos of me taken during pickleball activities for promotional purposes, without compensation.
EMERGENCY_MEDICAL_TREATMENT: Emergency Medical Treatment: In the event of an emergency, I authorize Pickle Park SDN BHD and representatives to secure and consent to medical treatment for me, including transportation to a medical facility if deemed necessary.

RELEASE_OF_LIABILITY_DESC:
The individual named below (referred to as "I" or "me"), in exchange for being permitted to utilize the Pickle Park facility located at 6455 Spine Rd Unit A, Boulder, CO 80301 (the "Facility"), which is owned and operated by Pickle Park LLC, and for other good and valuable consideration, the receipt and sufficiency of which is hereby acknowledged, hereby agrees to all the terms and conditions set forth in this agreement (this "Release").

Acknowledgement of Risk
I understand and acknowledge that my use of the Facility (and any equipment located therein) and my participation in any exercise, physical fitness, and/or recreational activities at the Facility (collectively, the "Activities"), is inherently dangerous, involving substantial risk of injury, property damage, pain, suffering, disability, and/or death. This risk of injury includes, but is not limited to: bruises, cuts, scrapes, broken bones, muscle pain, heart attack, stroke and other serious physical injuries.

Assumption of Risk
NOTWITHSTANDING THE ABOVE RISKS, I ACKNOWLEDGE THAT I AM VOLUNTARILY AND FREELY ACCESSING THE FACILITY AND PARTICIPATING IN THE ACTIVITIES WITH KNOWLEDGE OF THE DANGERS INVOLVED. I HEREBY AGREE TO ACCEPT AND ASSUME ALL RISKS OF INJURY, PROPERTY DAMAGE, PAIN, SUFFERING, DISABILITY, AND/OR DEATH ARISING THEREFROM, WHETHER CAUSED BY THE ORDINARY NEGLIGENCE OF PICKLE PARK LLC OR OTHER RELEASEES OR OTHERWISE.

Physical Condition; Compliance
I confirm that I am: (a) in good health and proper physical condition and do not have any medical or other conditions that would impair my ability to participate in the Activities; (b) not, and during the Activities will not be, under the influence of alcohol or any illicit or prescription drugs which would in any way impair my ability to safely participate in the Activities; and (c) not experiencing symptoms of COVID-19 or other infectious disease (collectively, the "Disease") (such as cough, shortness of breath, sore throat, congestion, headache, muscle or body aches, chills, or fever), and do not have a confirmed or suspected case of the Disease. I will comply with all federal, state, and local laws, orders, directives, and guidelines related to the Activities while at the Facility or participating in the Activities. I will also follow all instructions, recommendations, and cautions of Pickle Park LLC at all times. If at any time I believe conditions to be unsafe, that I am no longer in proper physical or mental condition to participate in the Activities, or I begin experiencing symptoms of the Disease, I will immediately discontinue further participation in the Activities and cease accessing the Facility. I acknowledge that it is my sole responsibility to determine whether I am sufficiently fit and healthy enough to participate in the Activities, and that Pickle Park LLC is relying on the aforementioned statements to allow me to access the Facility and participate in the Activities.

Insurance
I have adequate insurance (including, without limitation, health insurance) necessary to provide for and pay any and all medical costs, or other losses, that may directly or indirectly result from my participation in the Activities.

No Warranties
I have neither requested nor received any express representations or warranties as to my participation in the Activities, and Pickle Park LLC and other Releasees have not made and do not make any actual or implied representations or warranties regarding such matters.

WAIVER AND RELEASE
I HEREBY EXPRESSLY WAIVE AND RELEASE ANY AND ALL CLAIMS, NOW KNOWN OR HEREAFTER KNOWN, AGAINST PICKLE PARK LLC OR ITS AFFILIATES, INCLUDING, WITHOUT LIMITATION, AND EACH OF THEIR RESPECTIVE OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, MANAGERS, EMPLOYEES, AGENTS, AFFILIATES, SHAREHOLDERS, MEMBERS, SUCCESSORS, AND ASSIGNS (COLLECTIVELY, THE "RELEASEES") ON ACCOUNT OF INJURY, PROPERTY DAMAGE, PAIN, SUFFERING, DISABILITY OR DEATH ARISING OUT OF OR ATTRIBUTABLE TO MY BEING AT THE FACILITY OR PARTICIPATING IN THE ACTIVITIES, WHETHER ARISING OUT OF THE ORDINARY NEGLIGENCE OF PICKLE PARK LLC OR ANY RELEASEES OR OTHERWISE TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW. I COVENANT NOT TO MAKE OR BRING ANY SUCH CLAIM AGAINST PICKLE PARK LLC OR ANY OTHER RELEASEE, AND FOREVER RELEASE AND DISCHARGE PICKLE PARK LLC AND ALL OTHER RELEASEES FROM LIABILITY UNDER SUCH CLAIMS.

Indemnification
I shall defend, indemnify, and hold harmless the Releasees against any and all losses, damages, liabilities, deficiencies, claims, actions, judgments, settlements, interest, awards, penalties, fines, costs, or expenses of whatever kind, including reasonable attorneys' fees, the costs of enforcing any right to indemnification under this Release, and the cost of pursuing any insurance providers, arising out of or in any way resulting from my being at the Facility or participating in the Activities.

Photo Release
By entering the Facility and participating in the Activities, I hereby grant Pickle Park LLC and other Releasees, the irrevocable right and permission to photograph and/or record me in connection with the Activities and to use the photograph and/or recording for all purposes, including advertising and promotional purposes, in any manner and all media now or hereafter known, in perpetuity throughout the world, without restriction as to alteration and without compensation.

Effect of Termination
The provisions of this Release will continue in full force and effect even after the termination of my right to participate in the Activities.

Miscellaneous
This Release constitutes the sole and entire agreement of the parties with respect to the subject matter contained herein and supersedes all prior and contemporaneous understandings, agreements, representations, and warranties, both written and oral, with respect to such subject matter. If any term or provision of this Release is invalid, illegal, or unenforceable in any jurisdiction, such invalidity, illegality, or unenforceability shall not affect any other term or provision of this Release or invalidate or render unenforceable such term or provision in any other jurisdiction. This Release shall also bind my heirs, executors, administrators, distributees, guardians, and next of kin. All matters arising out of or relating to this Release shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the internal laws of the State of Colorado without giving effect to any choice or conflict of law provision or rule (whether of the State of Colorado or any other jurisdiction). Any claim or cause of action arising under this Release may be brought only in the federal and state courts located in Boulder County, Colorado and I hereby consent to the exclusive jurisdiction of such courts.

I BY ACCEPTING, I ACKNOWLEDGE THAT I HAVE READ AND FULLY UNDERSTOOD ALL OF THE TERMS OF THIS RELEASE AND THAT I AM GIVING UP SUBSTANTIAL LEGAL RIGHTS, INCLUDING THE RIGHT TO SUE PICKLE PARK LLC, BY SIGNING IT, AND SIGN IT FREELY AND VOLUNTARILY WITHOUT INDUCEMENT.

RANKING_LOGIC_DESC:
Our ranking system is designed to fairly and dynamically adjust player rankings based on match outcomes. Here's how it works:

Dynamic Point Adjustments: Points gained or lost depend on the difference in ranking between opponents. Beating a higher-ranked opponent yields more points than beating a lower-ranked one.

Balanced Outcomes: Wins, losses, and draws all affect rankings differently, ensuring a balanced and fair progression.

New Player Boost: New players receive a temporary multiplier on their point changes, allowing them to reach their appropriate skill level faster.

Gradual Progression: The system is designed so that consistent performance over time is required to significantly change your ranking.

Self-Correcting: If a player is incorrectly ranked, the system allows for quicker adjustments through matches against higher or lower-ranked opponents.
